note.p: Education: St John's College, Oxford (matriculated 1711); Inner Temple
Career: Called to the Bar (1719); MP for Lichfield (1747-1770)

Notes: Never signed Charter Book or paid admission money. Journal Book (April 30, 1730; May 14, 1730; also, Council Minutes (May 9, 1730) is the only source for details of his election. Proposed by William Jones; Zachary Pearce; a Secretary
